title: Interstellar
description: A team travels through a wormhole to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: A concierge and his protégé navigate a changing Europe.

title: Spirited Away
description: A girl enters a world of spirits and must find her way home.

title: Parasite
description: Greed and class discrimination threaten a symbiotic relationship.

title: Knives Out
description: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric family.

title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
description: A Chinese-American woman is swept up in a mind-bending adventure across multiple universes.

title: The Bear
description: A young chef returns to Chicago to run his family's sandwich shop.

title: Succession
description: The Roy family controls a global media empire.

title: The White Lotus
description: Follow the exploits of guests and employees at a tropical resort.
